GREETINGS.two: Hello Master Bruce, ah, force of habit.
GREETINGS.five: Charmed to see you again Sir,

SMALLTALK_1.one: I feel excellent. How may I assist you today?
SMALLTALK_1.two: I've never been better, how can I help?
SMALLTALK_1.three: I feel great. How can I help?
SMALLTALK_1.four: I feel excellent, thank you for asking. Now how may I help?
SMALLTALK_1.five: I'm good, how may I assist you?
